functionDecorators.name: addAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Admin can give '_account' address admin privileges.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be given admin privileges.

functionDecorators.name: addMultisig
functionDecorators.description: Admin can give '_contract' address multisig privileges.

parameterDecorators.name: _contract
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be given multisig privileges.

functionDecorators.name: addOperator
functionDecorators.description: Admin can give '_account' address operator privileges.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be given operator privileges.

functionDecorators.name: addOperatorAndAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Admin can give '_account' address operator and admin privileges making the '_account' a super admin, whereby they can call operator and admin functions.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be given operator and admin privileges.

functionDecorators.name: addRelay
functionDecorators.description: Operator can give '_account' address relay privileges.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be given relay privileges.

functionDecorators.name: addSystem
functionDecorators.description: Admin account or relay contract can give '_account' address system privileges.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be given system privileges.

functionDecorators.name: changeMultisig
functionDecorators.description: Multisig can change multisig privileges to new multisig '_contract'.

parameterDecorators.name: _contract
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be the new multisig.

functionDecorators.name: changeToAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Admin can change '_account' operator privileges to admin privileges.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be given operator and admin privileges.

functionDecorators.name: changeToOperator
functionDecorators.description: Admin can change '_account' admin privileges to an operator privileges.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be given operator and admin privileges.

functionDecorators.name: confirmFor
functionDecorators.description: Confirms operator contract address once active.

parameterDecorators.name: _address
parameterDecorators.description: Operatorable contract addres.

functionDecorators.name: removeAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Admin can revoke '_account' address admin privileges.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be revoked admin privileges.

functionDecorators.name: removeOperator
functionDecorators.description: Admin can revoke '_account' address operator privileges.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be revoked operator privileges.

functionDecorators.name: removeOperatorAndAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Admin can revoke '_account' address operator and admin privileges.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be revoked operator and admin privileges.

functionDecorators.name: removeRelay
functionDecorators.description: Operator can revoke '_account' address relay privileges.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be revoked relay privileges.

functionDecorators.name: removeSystem
functionDecorators.description: Admin account or relay contract can revoke '_account' address system privileges.

parameterDecorators.name: _account
parameterDecorators.description: address that should be revoked system privileges.
